bt.name: Bloodthirster
bt.description: Auto-attacks heal for 50% of damage dealt.

gunblade.name: Hextech Gunblade
gunblade.description: User heals for 25% of all damage dealt.

shojin.name: Spear of Shojin
shojin.description: After casting, user gains 15% of their max mana per attack.

sotd.name: Sword of the Divine
sotd.description: Every second, the user has a 5% chance to earn 100% crit chance for the rest of the round.

youmuus.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
youmuus.description: Adds the 'Assassin' class to the user.

zekes.name: Zeke's Herald
zekes.description: Allies adjacent to the user gain +10% attack speed.

deathcap.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
deathcap.description: The user's ability damage is increased by 50%.

guinsoos.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
guinsoos.description: Attacks give 3% attack speed to the user. Stacks infinitely.

ludens.name: Luden's Echo
ludens.description: User deals 200 magic splash damage on ability hit.

locket.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
locket.description: On combat start, all adjacent allies to the user gain 200 shield.

ionic.name: Ionic Spark
ionic.description: When an enemy casts a spell, they take 200 damage.

morellos.name: Morellonomicon
morellos.description: Spells burn 2.5% of impacted enemies per second, as well as cutting healing.

rfc.name: Rapidfire Cannon
rfc.description: User's attacks cannot be dodged. Attack range is doubled.

ss.name: Statikk Shiv
ss.description: On every third attack, user deals 100 splash magic damage.

pd.name: Phantom Dancer
pd.description: User dodges all critical strikes (except from Rapidfire Cannon users).

shrink.name: Cursed Blade
shrink.description: User's attacks have a small chance to reduce enemy's star level by 1.

titanic.name: Titanic Hydra
titanic.description: User's attacks deal 10% of the user's max HP as splash damage in a cone behind the enemy.

seraphs.name: Seraph's Embrace
seraphs.description: User regains 20 mana each time they cast a spell.

fh.name: Frozen Heart
fh.description: Enemies adjacent to the user lose 20% attack speed.

silence.name: Hush
silence.description: User's attacks have a high chance to silence.

redemption.name: Redemption
redemption.description: On death, spawn a large circle that after a delay, heals all allies for 1000 HP.

thorn.name: Thornmail
thorn.description: User reflects 35% of damage taken from basic attacks.

disarm.name: Sword Breaker
disarm.description: User's basic attacks have a chance to disarm.

redbuff.name: Red Buff
redbuff.description: User's basic attacks burn enemies for 2.5% of their max HP while disabling healing.

zephyr.name: Zephyr
zephyr.description: At the beginning of a round, banish an enemy unit for 5 seconds.

runaans.name: Runaan's Hurricane
runaans.description: User's basic attacks fire 2 extra bolts to other enemies dealing 50% damage.

warmogs.name: Warmog's Armor
warmogs.description: User regenerates 3% of their max health per second.

fon.name: Force of Nature
fon.description: As long as item is equipped on anyone (field or bench), gain +1 team size.
